_comment: Floor RPS baselines for GitHub Actions free runners (2-core shared). Measured 2026-02-21: writer=23, reader=86, celebrity=43, aggregate=153 RPS. CI uses 50% tolerance so floors are ~half of observed. max_errors omitted — errors are expected on cold CI stack (Kafka publish failures are non-fatal). Celebrity key is a prefix — bench_regression_check.py matches any scenario name starting with that prefix, handling the dynamic N-code pool size. Local baselines: bench_baselines.json at 15% via make bench.
